channel.title: Sessions on South Dakota Code Camp
channel.description: Recent content in Sessions on South Dakota Code Camp

item.title: Systematic Debugging
item.description: Debugging is one of the most frustrating and time-consuming parts of software development and maintenance. This talk is an overview of a strategic debugging approach, as well as a few tips for avoiding code bugs and making debugging easier. There will not be a focus on specific tools or languages, but some experience with software development is assumed.
